about_the_game:
Attention! Identical packs cannot be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes:

  • Unique rank 16 gunship fighter “Bark-2”
  • Special weapon: Autocannon 2M-84
  • Active module: “GPB-20000”
  • Unique portrait “Ivan Oakenshield”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Permanent 10% bonus to credits gain
  • Paint: “Hexagonal chain mail”
  • Decor: “Fire of the Motherland”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Aiming overcharge
  • Combat reboot
  • Repair kit M
  • Auxiliary generator
  • Emergency barrier
  • Multiphase generator
  • Submatter shield
  • Reactive armor
  • Crystal plates
  • Passive armor
  • Proton wall
  • “Horizon” Module

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

Bark-2 is the newest modification of a multimode fighter jet plane capable of both aerial and space combat. It was developed by the New Empire in 4623. The external design of the fighter is reminiscent of Il-2EA, the first aircraft capable of successfully performing combat missions in the presence of the Signal.
detailed_description:
Attention! Identical packs cannot be activated on one account twice!
Attention! Identical ships from different purchased bundles are not compensated!

This bundle includes:

  • Unique rank 16 gunship fighter “Bark-2”
  • Special weapon: Autocannon 2M-84
  • Active module: “GPB-20000”
  • Unique portrait “Ivan Oakenshield”

Additionally, the pilot receives:
  • Permanent 10% bonus to credits gain
  • Paint: “Hexagonal chain mail”
  • Decor: “Fire of the Motherland”

Additionally, the pilot receives the modules:
  • Aiming overcharge
  • Combat reboot
  • Repair kit M
  • Auxiliary generator
  • Emergency barrier
  • Multiphase generator
  • Submatter shield
  • Reactive armor
  • Crystal plates
  • Passive armor
  • Proton wall
  • “Horizon” Module

Special bonus for everyone who buys the bundle — Premium license for 90 days!

Bark-2 is the newest modification of a multimode fighter jet plane capable of both aerial and space combat. It was developed by the New Empire in 4623. The external design of the fighter is reminiscent of Il-2EA, the first aircraft capable of successfully performing combat missions in the presence of the Signal.

name: Star Conflict - Bark-2 (Deluxe edition)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 512 MB, NVidia / AMD Radeon / Intel (HD 3000, HD 4000) with support for Pixel Shader 3.0 (AMD Radeon X1000 not supported)
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz, Intel Core 2 Duo / 2.5 GHz, AMD A6-9220
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Video Card: 1024 MB, NVidia GeForce 650 / AMD Radeon HD 5750
  • Hard Disk Space: 8.5 GB
  • Additional: Broadband Internet connection

English*, Russian*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Hungarian, Czech, Ukrainian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
